Curation of departments
If access permissions to the route object are regulated:
Within the Curation Matrix and
Outside the branch office, then after defining the Supervised and Supervising roles, the System will form a matrix of their relations called "Curation of departments":
The generated matrix includes only those departments that have employees with the roles specified in the "Supervising role" and "Supervised role" fields (for more information, refer to
Creating a Curation Matrix
).
In the matrix, you need to select the "intersection" of the required departments using the cursor to define whether the object is available for users of the departments specified. At the same time, the supervised departments are located vertically, while the supervising departments â€“ horizontally.
The System will highlight the selected cell in color (green - for the standard configuration of the platform design,
more about this
). This will indicate the interaction scheme for users of both roles.
In other words, in order for the manager in the Head Office to see all profiles from system developers of the all organizational structure, you need to select the appropriate cell.
A single Curation Matrix object can be used for multiple pairs of departments.
If you change the staffing table of an organization that is configured on the platform, you need to adjust the
Curation of departments manually
.
